channel.title: Help! my runserver not work! please look!
channel.description:
ok i am normaly good with it but idk why but when i try to compile it or use runserver it sais this
Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Press any key to continue . . .
Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Press any key to continue . . . i have tryd seeing if i was useing jdk 5.0 or 6.0 but it did'nt work =/ what do i do? o and the batch file when you click edit is this: @echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

u can scan for virus there is none!

item.title: Help! my runserver not work! please look!
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

=( didnt work but it is better looking runserver said same thing =( o ill never get it[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 09:49:45 AM[/size][hr]ok i ill try [br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 09:50:30 AM[/size][hr]didnt work =/ its not the programing in it hhmmm ill try downloading jdk 6 got a link anyone? and ty guys[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 09:52:46 AM[/size][hr]=/ i dont know what hapend but it sucks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 09:54:12 AM[/size][hr]please. any one got a jdk6.0 download link?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 09:55:35 AM[/size][hr]=/ any one?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 10:04:14 AM[/size][hr]sorry i was gone i lost connection idk why =/ but any one got a link???[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 10:18:32 AM[/size][hr]hellO??? sorry for spammin but cmon post somthin!
[center] [/center]

item.title: Help! my runserver not work! please look!
item.dc:creator: @1_b4rr4g3_1 1 b4rr4g3 1
item.description:
@1_b4rr4g3_1 wrote:

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Itryd i i work it
